content:
HL7 and TransCelerate Biopharma, Inc. will be hosting a 90-minute webinar on Wednesday, August 2 at 10am Eastern Time to discuss plans related to the use of HL7速 FHIR速 as eSource in Clinical Research. The TransCelerate Biopharma eSource project team is looking to actively encourage an engage technology app developers and solution providers from the FHIR community and the world of Clinical Research to explore specific use cases and demonstrate opportunities for applying FHIR to improve clinical research processes at the San Diego Connectathon on Sept. 9-10, 2017.
https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/7656933389144588290

Do you have this recorded
I think it was recorded... and that recording is made available to those that registered.
